parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary, but obsolete omo, for which another prolonged form omoo is used in certain tenses; to swear, i.e. Take oath.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
Half. Neuter of a derivative from an inseparable prefix akin to hama and meaning semi-; half.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From basileus; properly, royalty, i.e. rule, or a realm.
